ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:53:45 [Issue ID 4000-132923] urn:comicvine:4000-132923 urn:comixology:686078 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:49:59. [Issue ID 273862]
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 1 of 2: She-Hulk thinks she hears her biological clock ticking and wonders if it is a family she wants, or just the love of the right man? Is it even responsible for a woman in her line of work to have a family? She-Hulk's solution to her problems is bound up in her relationship with Wyatt Wingfoot and their battle against Carlton Beatrice. Carlton has turned all of his resources, both Corporate and Mystic, to a plot that threatens not only Wyatt Wingfoot's Keewazi Indian Reservation, but ultimately the very soul of every living being on Earth.
ComicInfo.Title: Part 1 of 2
ComicInfo.Writer: Dwayne McDuffie,Robin D. Chaplik,Dwayne McDuffie,Robin D. Chaplik
